channel.title: Troll Romance
channel.description: I need help with this quest! Anyone want to help me or do it with me? All the guides online are outdated, because a lot of things changed.

item.title: Troll Romance
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:24, topic:435656"][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=538376.msg3943093#msg3943093 date=1331589689]

Sorry, I was born with a disease.

God bless you. I will donate money to help with your skin cancer.
[/quote]
Is that why he’s so brown?[/quote]

No, I don’t believe sickle cell anemia has anything to do with skin color.

Read full topic

item.title: Troll Romance
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Bokluk:

are you fucking kidding me? as said a few replies above even a 10yo kid can do them by just following the dialogues without any videos and guides and you can’t even do it with a guide.

I don’t know why you’re associating age with intelligence. You must be 5 years old or something.

And there’s a difference between being lazy and being too stupid to do them without a guide.

Read full topic

item.title: Troll Romance
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:15, topic:435656"][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=538376.msg3939645#msg3939645 date=1331317202]

The map of Burthorpe is wrong. o_O …at least I think it is.

I can’t find the guy whose name begins with a D.

oh right yeah i forgotted;p
[/quote] Who Whom Amount For What Where When Kidpaparoach (+10/-110) -Nothing (+10/-113) -1 yes you can. - mscp
Oh please tell me, How can you not understand what to do in a quest when the npc’s give very clear instructions of what to do? RS quests include puzzles, but even a 7 year old could figure them out, so you have be a complete idiot if you can’t solve them and finish the quests.[/quote]

Kindly move along, as I stated before. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Troll Romance
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

“unless you are retarded and can’t read or use your brain.”, I suck at questing and so do loads of people. Who says its the puzzles etc, I just suck at it. I found “unless you are retarded and can’t read or use your brain.” as a retarded statement. You can be smart and be bad at certain aspects of a game… derp.

Read full topic

[/quote]
oh right yeah i forgotted;p[/quote] Who Whom Amount For What Where When Kidpaparoach (+10/-110) -Nothing (+10/-113) -1 yes you can. - mscp
Oh please tell me, How can you not understand what to do in a quest when the npc’s give very clear instructions of what to do? RS quests include puzzles, but even a 7 year old could figure them out, so you have be a complete idiot if you can’t solve them and finish the quests.

item.title: Troll Romance
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

RuneScape Wiki

Dunstan

Dunstan is the chief blacksmith in Burthorpe, a town in Northern Asgarnia. He can be found in a hut in north-east Burthorpe marked by the sword sign on the minimap. Dunstan is featured in several quests: Death Plateau, Troll Stronghold, Troll Romance...

?

I’m pretty sure he’s in the same place

Read full topic

item.title: Troll Romance
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:3, topic:435656”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=538376.msg3938853#msg3938853 date=1331254740]

RuneScape Wiki

Troll Romance

Troll Romance is a quest revolving around troll love; specifically that of Ug for Aga. Ug loves Aga, but Aga is together with Arrg. Since Arrg is a lot stronger than Ug, Ug can't follow the regular mating ritual, which involves ripping the opponent...

Is that one outdated, too? Looks to be in order.
[/quote]

It’s really not too accurate. Even the maps are off.

I really need to do this quest, so if someone would help me, that’d be so great.[/quote]

Do like the Runescape Pioneers and feel your way through it.

Read full topic
